titleInfo.title: FPGA-accelerated Heterogeneous Hyperscale Server Architecture for Next-Generation Compute Clusters

name.namePart: First International Workshop on Heterogeneous High-performance Reconfigurable Computing (H2RC‘15), held in conjunction with Supercomputing 2015

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Griessl, R., Peykanu, M., Hagemeyer, J., Porrmann, M., Krupop, S., vor dem Berge, M., Kosmann, L., Knocke, P., Kierzynka, M. & Oleksiak, A. (2015). Gehalten auf der First International Workshop on Heterogeneous High-performance Reconfigurable Computing (H2RC‘15), held in conjunction with Supercomputing 2015.
bibliographicCitation.bio1:
Griessl R, Peykanu M, Hagemeyer J, Porrmann M, Krupop S, vor dem Berge M, Kosmann L, Knocke P, Kierzynka M, Oleksiak A (2015)
FPGA-accelerated Heterogeneous Hyperscale Server Architecture for Next-Generation Compute Clusters.
Presented at the First International Workshop on Heterogeneous High-performance Reconfigurable Computing (H2RC‘15), held in conjunction with Supercomputing 2015, Austin Texas, USA.
